title: The Most beautiful place on earth: international zone
creator_credit: Martin Bunnel, Pierre des Bonnet and United Nations Television
brief_description: Shows the scientific research undertaken on Antarctica, which has been declared open for use by all mankind for scientific and peaceful purposes. This film shows the international co-operation achieved in efforts to preserve the unique environment of the continent.
